Package it.polimi.softeng.model.scoreCount

Class Score

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.model.scoreCount.Score
public class Score extends Object
This class contains some static methods useful for score calculation

  • Method Details

    • GroupsOfEqualTiles

      public static boolean GroupsOfEqualTiles(Shelfie s, int required, int size)
      Parameters:
      s - is the shelfie
      required - required group to achieve the objective
      size - required size of the group
      Returns:
      true if the objective is achieved, false if not According to the rules even if the size of adjacent tiles is bigger than desired size the group is counted as one

    • DFS

      public static int DFS(Tile[][] grid, int r, int c)
      Parameters:
      grid - is the shelfie.getGrid()
      r - current row
      c - current column
      Returns:
      number of counted tiles, adjacent and of the same color, beginning from current tile

    • ScoreForGroups

      public static int ScoreForGroups(Shelfie s)
      Parameters:
      s - is the shelfie
      Returns:
      number of points earned by counting groups

    • twoOfDifferent

      public static boolean twoOfDifferent(Shelfie s, boolean columns)
      Parameters:
      s - It's the shelfie to check
      columns - It's true if the method is called from TwoColumnsOfSixDifferent, false if it's called from TwoRowsOfFiveDifferent
      Returns:
      0 if the shelfie doesn't respect the card or 1 if it does

    • PersonalCardsScore

      public static int PersonalCardsScore(PersonalCards p, Shelfie s)
      Parameters:
      p - is the PersonalCard
      s - is the shelfie
      Returns:
      score achieved in PersonalCard

    • verifyMaxDifferentColor

      public static boolean verifyMaxDifferentColor(Shelfie s, int maxDifferentColor, int target, int maxOuter, int maxInner, Score.Mode mode)
      This method verifies FourRowsOfOneTwoThreeTypes and ThreeColumnsOfOneTwoThreeTypes CommonCards with the same algorithm To distinguish them we use Mode.ROW for FourRowsOfOneTwoThreeTypes and Mode.COLUMN for ThreeColumnsOfOneTwoThreeTypes
      Parameters:
      s - is the shelfie
      maxDifferentColor - indicates how many different color can a row / column contain
      target - indicates how many rows / column do you need to complete the CommonCard
      maxOuter - indicates the upper limit of outer cycle: - maxOuter = shelfieRows for ROW - maxOuter = shelfieColumns for COLUMN
      maxInner - indicates the upper limit of inner cycle: - maxInner = shelfieColumns for ROW - maxInner = shelfieRows for COLUMN
      mode - indicates which mode (ROW-COLUMN) the method have to verify
      Returns:
      true if the shelfie completes the CommonCard
